metadata.name: Bomber Frens #1
metadata.description: Boom! Bomber Frens is collection of 5,000 bomber characters based on nostalgic 8-bit and 16-bit multiplayer battle maze gameplay. Under the parent Web3 IP umbrella, Lucky Frens, weâ€™re introducing the Lucky Arcade, a GameFi arcade library platform with Bomber Frens as the hero launch title. Your Bomber Frens will open up access to navigate upgrades, staking and earnings with our exclusive $LFC token as the language of currency for the marketplace and games. Visit http://luckyfrens.io or http://bomberfrens.xyz for more details.
